notification.body: Use #MTLvLA, #IMFC or #LAGalaxy on Twitter or Instagram for a chance to have your post featured on the MatchCenter
notification.title: Get Published on MLSsoccer.com

previewArticle.title: Montreal Impact vs. LA Galaxy | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Montreal Impact 2, LA Galaxy 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Montreal Impact play host to the red-hot LA Galaxy at Stade Saputo.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Montreal Impact vs. LA Galaxy

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: And we're off. #MTLvLA. Predicting a 3-1 #LAGalaxy victory.

timelineItems.comment: Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: On va marquer pendant la minute Ouimette. Et ça sera beau. Tu peux fav. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).
Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 15-1 - @LAGalaxy have outscored opponents 15-1 in their last four #MLS games. Landslide. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Brian Rowe.

timelineItems.name: John Molinaro
timelineItems.text: Di Vaio with a pass for a wide open Romero who can't beat the 'keeper. Should be 2-0 for Impact. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Andres Romero vote pour ranimer le débat que les filets de soccer sont trop petits. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: LA switch out of the 3-5-2 coming in 5... 4... 3... 2... #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.name: TousPourGagner
timelineItems.text: Étonnament, #IMFC domine les 10 premières minutes!

timelineItems.comment: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leonardo (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: Everybody knew Di Vaio was going to play it wide to Romero, but still the defense fell for it. That's well-earned respect there. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Marc-André Donato
timelineItems.text: Home sweet home. #imfc #impactmontreal #impactmtl #mtl #mls #soccer #igersmontreal #igmontreal #igersmtl #montreal #quebec

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Dang, I thought @gyasinho was gonna hammer than one home. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Patrick Leduc
timelineItems.text: Nacho Piatti, surpris par la fréquence des contacts en #MLS va aimer le #LAGalaxy... Pressing moins intense #IMFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy).
Offside, Montreal Impact. Calum Mallace tries a through ball, but Dilly Duka is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Mike Fabert
timelineItems.text: I haven't watched a lot of Montreal Impact this year, but they look better than a team with 20 points for me. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Keane has to be MVP, right? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Landon Donovan and Robbie Keane combine beautifully

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: Surpris ! J'aime ce que je vois depuis 15 min. de #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: The good: Passing in the attacking half. The bad: Leonardo's existence #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: En difficulté sur certaines offensives de LA (milieu def parfois un peu en retard), #IMFC doit profiter des boulevards du 3-5-2 des Galaxy.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Marco Di Vaio with a golden opportunity

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: The first of three matches tonight begins right about NOW! #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Mallace playing well. Moving around and just finding pockets of space in the LA midfield #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Montreal Impact 2, LA Galaxy 2.

timelineItems.name: ThreeForAWin
timelineItems.text: Not exactly the greatest of masterpieces by Leonardo right there. #MTLvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Full time. Fair result. This is all on Bruce. Come up with a better make shift lineup for Sunday please. That sucked. #LAGalaxy #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Olivier Morneau
timelineItems.text: #IMFC égalise face à la meilleure équipe de la MLS. Vu comme ça, c'est pas si mal.

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: The #lagalaxy came back from 2-0 on the road to save a point. That's my takeaway

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Earlier tonight, a little bit of brilliance from Ignacio Piatti helped Montreal go up 2-0 on the Galaxy. http://t.co/nDzweYkaIy #MTLvLA

timelineItems.desc: The Montreal Impact play host to the red-hot LA Galaxy at Stade Saputo.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Montreal Impact vs. LA Galaxy | September 10, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: ICYMI: The red hot @gyasinho scored his fifth goal in three matches to pull LA within one of the Impact. http://t.co/nFChS1RlXH #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: The Galaxy avoided an upset thanks to this Alan Gordon second-half goal. http://t.co/Oc3zfQuQF2 #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHTS: On its first trip to Stade Saputo, @LAGalaxy quashed an upset bid with two second-half goals. http://t.co/5IoGWSnIvo #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Good job wall. #LAGalaxy #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Maria Henriquez
timelineItems.text: Mercredi soir au stade! Bonne fête Carla! @carlaahenriquezz 🎀✌️⚽️ #IMFC #prepartyaustade #debutdesfestivites #18deCarla @beyonkah_xo We're old! 👵👑

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: For the record, I've got #LAGalaxy winning tonight and losing Sunday at SJ. Crazy travel, fatigue, #MLS, etc., being my reasons. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marcelo Sarvas.

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Encore en danger sur les reconversions rapides de LA. Encore Mallace en soutien de la défense. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Is Gandalf in the stadium? No one can pass. #MTLvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Both clubs have had chances. Neither have made them count. Who draws first blood? #MTLvLA http://t.co/65BtryM7TI

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact).
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Leslie
timelineItems.text: After that 6-0 win this game feels super slow #lagalaxy #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: It's amazing how Dilly Duka's body language has changed in the last few games. He looks confident. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: david soto
timelineItems.text: The back 3 is scary #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Was that your I-told-you-so Dilly Duka moment, @MLSAnalyst?

timelineItems.name: Bobby
timelineItems.text: Oh!!.. what a passing play... #Felipe to #Duka to #Divaio!.. GOOOOOOL!.. 1-0 #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Ignacio Piatti with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Francisco X. Rivera
timelineItems.text: Marco Di Vaio scored 144 goals in Serie A (27th all time). He has more than Zlatan, Vialli, Sheva, Toni, among others #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Quelle passe de Nacho ! #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: Andy Smith
timelineItems.text: This 3-man back line is getting shredded. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Guess Montreal didn't get the memo that LA is red hot. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: That's so easy. Bruce knows it. Midfield has been horrible. Giving possession away. Not working back. Defense on an island. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Nicolas A Martineau
timelineItems.text: Rappelons que le Galaxy mène 15-1 sur ses 4 derniers rivaux. #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Robbie Keane puts one just wide

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: You* don't know #MLS. #MTLvLA *Not a single damn one of us

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: No wingbacks means that the counter is going to be an issue. I'd expect Arena to switch up this formation at the half. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: MLS Live on one screen and ESPN2 on another isn't a bad way to get your soccer fix tonight. #MTLvLA #DCvNY

timelineItems.name: Chief Keith
timelineItems.text: MONTREAL IS BEATING LA WTF AM I IN CANADIAN SOCCER HEAVEN #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Gyasi Zardes.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right following a corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Stefan Ishizaki rips one just off target

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Matteo Ferrari.

timelineItems.name: MaxMurray
timelineItems.text: Malade le jeu! Tout simplement malade, Felipe et les 4 en avant commencent a connecter pas mal #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: If you're going to play back-three your wing backs need to track back and defend. Husidic and Ishizaki haven't done that. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Leonardo following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Montreal doing a good impression of the LA midfield. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Klopas parle du niveau d'émotion très élevé ce soir pour Karl Ouimette. La grande famille de l'Impact est très unie #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Bruce Arena is outside the technical box, the smallest in football/soccer history. We expect a 10-game suspension #MTLvLA #imfc

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: 34:00 and so on. W. time. #IMFC

timelineItems.title: SAVE: Brian Rowe not fooled by the deflection

timelineItems.name: Guillaume
timelineItems.text: Ma femme me laisse regarder #IMFC pendant la lune de miel #bestwifeever #besthoneymoonever

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Shivers down my spine during that minute of applause.

timelineItems.desc: Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Dan Gargan gets written up

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: 34' #IMFCFamily #LucaKnewLove #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Wow. Intense. Je n'ai pas honte d'avouer que j'ai la larme à l'oeil en ce moment à la suite de cette belle minute. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: «Avec toi Karl», la bannière brandie présentement par les Ultras. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 36' Riley getting some words from Pat Noonan on the sidelines. That's usually the sign... #MTLvLA #IMFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Evan Bush gets big to deny Robbie Keane

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Matteo Ferrari.

timelineItems.name: Antoine Deshaies
timelineItems.text: La foule debout à 34 minutes pour Karl W Ouimette. Les #ultras chantent pour lui après. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Antony D. Casimiro
timelineItems.text: Gargan sera suspendu pour le prochain match #accumulationdecartonsjaunes #imfc #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan will miss the game against San Jose. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Omar González (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Jennifer Gonzales
timelineItems.text: Keano really is a magician. I predict a goal soon. @LAGalaxy #MTLvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: And that's why you don't have a three man back line with Leo. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andrés Romero.

timelineItems.name: MaxMurray
timelineItems.text: Duka > Nyassi. Clairement. Klopas mérite une chance comme DS... Comme coach on repassera #imfc

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 2, LA Galaxy 0. Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Felipe Martins following a fast break.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Ignacio Piatti continues his brilliance in Montreal

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: #backthree

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: Vic Rauter (TSN) just said that Landon Donovan's dad is Canadian from Nova Scotia. #CANMNT could have used him! #IMFC #IMFClive #TSN690

timelineItems.name: John Struthers
timelineItems.text: It's a new team!!!! #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dilly Duka.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: No joke, thought Felipe was going to screw up that 3 v 0 #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Etienne M.
timelineItems.text: Piatti is class. Montreal would be in a different position, had he joined then earlier. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Stade Saputo a House of Horrors for the Galaxy. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: There need to be changes at half time. Dare I say it, an attacking sub for a fourth defender. #LAGalaxy #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Lucas Muller
timelineItems.text: I think the teams accidentally thought they were the other team. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: He bien Felipe il n'est pas mauvais ce soir, ça va lui faire du bien. Et Piatti, je pense qu'il va être pas pire. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Extremely odd decision for Arena to go with 3 at the back tonight. It's almost like he's ego trippin' after the last few weeks. #MTLvLA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Prediction change: #LAGalaxy lose tonight, beat SJ 6-0 on Sunday without Donovan and Gargan. That's pretty #MLS, right? #MTLvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: BLOCK: Hassoun Camara denies Gyasi Zardes a goal

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Officially it looks like Leo got a Yellowcard. So Landon is okay, for now. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.
First Half ends, Montreal Impact 2, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.name: Mike Fabert
timelineItems.text: How did we not score... #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: 2-0 Impact at the half. Woof.

timelineItems.name: Jason Perkowski
timelineItems.text: Aside from the #timbers there's no other team I love seeing on the losing side more than the #lagalaxy. #ebfg

timelineItems.name: Will
timelineItems.text: Please tell me Nacho Piatti is falling in love in Montreal. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sam Coff
timelineItems.text: What the heck is happening to the Galaxy in Montreal? #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Confirmed. Yellow on Donovan following the Impact goal. LD suspended with yellow card accumulation for Sunday at SJ. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Mike Fabert
timelineItems.text: 3-2 is still very possible, so let's play! Let's go #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Et si Piatti était arrivé en avril, comme prévu au départ ? #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Montreal Impact 2, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.name: Soccer Québec
timelineItems.text: 2 AUTRES BUTS EN 2E DEMIE!? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Galaxy switch to back four. Rogers slots in on the left. Ishizaki off. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).
Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Tannenwald
timelineItems.text: Bravo. RT @impactmontreal: Marco Di Vaio ran to the bench after scoring to celebrate with Karl Ouimette. #IMFC http://t.co/U9KaGknqCQ

timelineItems.name: Off to Neverland
timelineItems.text: Ok seriously that was scary dangerous. #LAGalaxy Gargan's gonna have to cover a lot of ground.

timelineItems.name: Joey Alfieri
timelineItems.text: #IMFC confirm that Ferrari has exited the game with an undisclosed injury

timelineItems.name: david bechtel
timelineItems.text: Seriously, LA Galaxy!? The second best team in West should not be bested by the worst team in the East. @MLS #Soccer #Football #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Ferrari semblait incommodé à la cuisse droite en 1re mi-temps. Peut-être l'aine #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.desc: Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Ignacio Piatti booked for a late tackle

timelineItems.name: Matt Dewey
timelineItems.text: “Go Montreal?” ~ Everyone around the league right now. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - This will be just the third #MLS meeting between LA and Montreal. LA drew in Montreal and won at home. Brief. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Matteo Maldini
timelineItems.text: I hope #IMFC respects the LA Galaxy by showing them who's boss at Stade Saputo and take the game to them #ForzaImpact #AllezMontreal

timelineItems.name: Sandro R
timelineItems.text: #IMFC #LAGalaxy #mercild http://t.co/QhnzWYK6yR

timelineItems.name: Elizabeth C.
timelineItems.text: The #IMFC and #LAGalaxy families are both in mourning for lost loved ones...should be an emotionally charged game at the Stade Saputo.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Took a photo with some @acbrigade members on tour here in #Montreal. #MTLvLA #LAGalaxy http://t.co/8akiu4kusc

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Karl W. Ouimette is on the bench tonight. Played a few minutes for Canada last night. Quite the emotional week-and-a-half he's had.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact).
Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Upset brewing in Montreal? LA will do all it can to stop it. You can check it out on MLS Live #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: So LD and Gargan get yellowed and will miss Sunday. Well there goes my @MLSFantasy week. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - @impactmontreal have scored multiple goals in three consecutive #MLS games for just the third time in their history. Streak. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Seth Hansen
timelineItems.text: BOOOO East Coast start times for #LAGalaxy games. Even worse forgot to set the DVR BOOOO on me.

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Let's do this! #WinItForJulie #IMFClive #BleuBlancNoir

timelineItems.name: John Struthers
timelineItems.text: Let's rock n roll!!! #impact versus #galaxy!!! #mls #soccer #imfc http://t.co/lUm74o1d6j

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: really looks like McInerney a victim of #IMFC formation - sure he'd love to be facing #LAGalaxy, deserves to as well #MTLvLA #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane a pris le temps de saluer Karl Ouimette au banc avant le début du match #class #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Seul moyen pour #IMFC de surprendre le LA Galaxy ? Euh... Un miracle ? #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Alain McKenna
timelineItems.text: Quand l'équipe mêne 2-0 mais que tu sais que c'est loin d'être gagné... C'est une saison de même. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Richard Jaffa
timelineItems.text: The Montreal players have been given an astonishing amount of time/space on the ball in attacking positions #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Landon Donovan tries a through ball, but Robbie Keane is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Tannenwald
timelineItems.text: Four goals already since joining MLS for Ignacio Piatti. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Demers
timelineItems.text: Mallace joue bien, même si Felipe scrappe la moitié de ses efforts défensifs #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Leonardo (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.
Delay in match Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 2, LA Galaxy 1. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Gyasi Zardes stays hot and slots one home

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Looks like Ouimette coming on with Camara injured.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Andrés Romero.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Marcelo Sarvas following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Joël Gabbay
timelineItems.text: At the very least the #IMFC are playing better. Frank Klopas seems to have this team under solid control now. Bottom-up or top-down? Both?

timelineItems.name: Antony D. Casimiro
timelineItems.text: Les jambes fraîches d'un vieux renard. Appuyé par Nacho, ça peut faire des flammèches #JusteTroisDéfenseurs #IMFC #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Montreal will be able to launch long balls over the midfield and look for speedy players to outrun a slow back line. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Holy cow that was a good goal.

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Zardes with his 15th goal of the season. Leads all Americans in #MLS #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Alejandro Valdes
timelineItems.text: Take a bow, Zardes! #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Juninho pour Zardes, toute la défense montréalaise surprise, suspense relancé à #MTLvLA 2-1

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@gyasinho is not a fan of the upset narrative. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Evan Bush flies to deny Robbie Rogers

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Karl Ouimette.
Foul by Karl Ouimette (Montreal Impact).
Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Etienne M.
timelineItems.text: Zardes is a special breed. What a season he's having. Even has poaching skills, #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: L'impact doit vraiment accepter que c'est une équipe de contre, de jeu rapide, de "breaks" Ca va mieux aller comme ca #MTLvLA #imfc

timelineItems.name: Mario Taddeo
timelineItems.text: Will be interesting to see how #imfc responds after losing camera/Ferrari and giving up a 2 goal lead #IMFClive #MLS #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 2, LA Galaxy 2. Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from very close range to the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Alan Gordon finds space and powers home the equalizer

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Alan Gordon... tête..header.... I got a feeling #MTLvLA #imfc

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Gordo on for #LAGalaxy. Bruce by like "SEND FORTH ALL LEGIONS! DO NOT STOP THE ATTACK UNTIL THE CITY IS TAKEN!" #MTLvLA

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 1, LA Galaxy 0. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from very close range to the center of the goal. Assisted by Dilly Duka.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Marco Di Vaio finishes off a beautiful counter attack

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Galaxy were just kidding about that first 45 minutes, I guess. Also, Donovan just got his 132nd assist... #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Bruce Arena, ladies and gentlemen.

timelineItems.comment: Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Gordon at it again! #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Todd Marks
timelineItems.text: Fuuuuuuuu. Remind me why the Quakes got rid of Gordon again? LA still may win by 3 at this rate. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Cris0rtiz
timelineItems.text: Yup, definitely suck as a defense when Camara and Ferrari are not on. First time I've realized it #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Landon Donovan credited with a second assist on Alan Gordon's goal. Now just 3 shy of tying Steve Ralston's MLS all-time record. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Whatever Bruce said in the locker room is working. #LAGalaxy #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Omar González.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Sarvas, you need to know better. That elbow could mean a suspension coming. #LAGalaxy #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Mariel
timelineItems.text: Bless you, @LAGalaxy! How about another goal? ps. I take back all the things I said about Alan Gordon when he was in San Jose. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).
Ignacio Piatti (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Manifeste du supporter #IMFC ? RT @RDSca: #IMFC : Ce n'est pas terminé! Faites du bruit!!! #lesvraisnabandonnentpas

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Impact: Attacks like a counter attacking team Defends as if it had 70% of ball possession 2-2 #MTLvLA #imfc

timelineItems.name: Antony D. Casimiro
timelineItems.text: Et il semblerai que Tissot sera le 3e et dernier changement de Klopas. Pour préserver la nulle ou pour l'offensive? #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Tissot entrera pour Duka. McInerney est sur le banc #justsaying #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.comment: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy).
Foul by Maxim Tissot (Montreal Impact).
Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Je me jette sur ces deux derniers matches-exemples pour hurler au monde : CHANGE PAS TA PAIRE DE CENTRAUX EN PLEIN MATCH L'AMI. #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Marco Di Vaio blasts one at Brian Rowe

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Homegrown players time! #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Felipe Martins.

timelineItems.name: Antony D. Casimiro
timelineItems.text: À voir la stratégie employée par Klopas, il y va pour un 3e but. Di Vaio Felipe, Nacho & Tissot jouent haut #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Brian Rowe has had some excellent moments tonight. #LAGalaxy have a solid back up in goal. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Leonardo.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: So turnovers are going to be crucial. LA has to stomp out bad turnovers. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Entertaining first few minutes Bruce? #MTLvLA http://t.co/7vtPS1yBcx

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Brian Rowe comes up huge for LA

timelineItems.name: Cole Burpee
timelineItems.text: "@Ben_Jata: .@LAGalaxy have outscored its opponents 34-12 in their last 11 matches. #MTLvLA #MLS" that is unreal.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Alan Gordon (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Mila Araujo
timelineItems.text: And... I made it to the match! #allez! #montreal #imfc #ultras #montreal

timelineItems.name: Elizabeth C.
timelineItems.text: Here's a handy meme for every #IMFC game, ever. http://t.co/M4N2MTuEaj

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Jaune à Felipe. Suspendu au prochain match #IMFC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.name: Erick VanStatic
timelineItems.text: Its like if the retirement announcement made @landondonovan a go back to his top form. #rethinkretirement #LAGalaxy #MLS #USMNT

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Montreal Impact. Ignacio Piatti tries a through ball, but Andrés Romero is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: It's been like night and day. Like the sun came out and energised the molecules that make up the #lagalaxy to liven up

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Wandrille Lefevre (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: That's absolutely a foul. With no play on the ball, could have been a card. #LAGalaxy #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: All those shots for LA. Can they find the back of the net one more time before the final whistle? #MTLvLA http://t.co/iANxTHjyut

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Omar González tries a through ball, but Robbie Keane is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Hand ball. #LAGalaxy need to do something here on this restart. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Montreal’s Malluce picks up a booking for a rough tackle on Landon Donovan. That is not allowed in soccer. http://t.co/xjCY3W1v5x #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Jose Villarreal about to check into the game. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.name: Lloyd Barker
timelineItems.text: Coach Klopas absolutely needs to find a way to reintegrate McInerney back into the team. #IMFClive #IMFC

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy doing a better closing gaps and preventing lob openings. Still not anything in attack. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marco Di Vaio.

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: As bad as they've been this year, Montreal has been tremedous tonight in pressuring the player on the ball. Rustling up #LAGalaxy feathers.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The referee has indicated a minimum of three minutes of stoppage time. Can the #LAGalaxy find a late winner? http://t.co/xjCY3W1v5x #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
Jose Villarreal (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Robbie's control lookin dope. #MTLvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jose Villarreal.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Karl Ouimette.

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Bush de là. Super sortie aérienne. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Leonardo (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Dan Gargan with a cross following a corner.
Second Half ends, Montreal Impact 2, LA Galaxy 2.
